title: Tropical Spice Cake
ingredients: ['225g butter', '400g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '250ml buttermilk', '165g chopped raisins', '115g chopped walnuts', '375g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 (432g) tin crushed pineapple with juice', '150g desiccated coconut', '500g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons grated lemon zest', '2 lemons, juiced', '350ml water']
